text: Lyudimila Mykhailivna Pavlichenko (12 July 1916 10 October 1974 was a Soviet sniper. She shot German soldiers in World War 2. She was one of the top military snipers of all time, and is credited with 309 kills.The 10 deadliest snipers of all time, Business Insider (September 8, 2015) She was the most successful female sniper in history.Lady sniper, TIME Magazine (Monday, September 28, 1942) == References == Category:1916 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II Category:Soviet military people
title: Lyudmila Pavlichenko
